"Sonikkuuu!" A familiar voice rang in Sonic's ears as he raised his head and blinked when he saw Amy in the front of the TV, wearing a bikini and looking back up at him innocently. Sonic shook his head to get his bearings and did a double take. "Oh, it's you, Amy...", Sonic muttered. "The one and only!" Amy blushed and giggled, "I've just been sunbathing down at Emerald Coast and I was wondering where you've been!" Sonic patted his big blobby paunch. "I haven't really been anywhere thanks to you-know-what. I was hoping you'd be the last person to see me like this..", he sighed. "Ah.. Craving those chilli-dogs again, my Sonikku?", giggled Amy as she walked over to him and had a feel of his belly. She gasped with delight when her hand disappeared into it and she felt its softness. A smile flickered on her face and she started groping his folds, causing Sonic's ears to perk up. "Amy!?" He yelped, "W-what on earth are you doing?" She heaved Sonic lengthways on the couch so he was lying down and straddled his belly whilst rubbing it. "Ooh Sonic.." murmurred Amy as she lay on him and kissed him on his chubby cheeks, "I've always wondered what you'd be like if you were big 'n fat, and now I have to say, I LOVE you like this!" She squeaked a little and started humping him playfully, panting and blushing whilst Sonic covered his face in embarrassment, hoping that this was just some kind of nightmare. Amy sank into him a bit, his fat squishing up all around her and she stopped humping and sighed. "I'm so going to keep you like this", she said with a big smile. "But Amy..." Sonic muttered, "I can't be like this any longer, I'm supposed to be the fastest thing alive!! And-" Amy kissed him on the lips before he could trail off into a rant and looked at him sweetly. "Here's an idea, and I'm just gonna throw this out on the table- you could be the fattest thing alive!" She beamed and drooled at the thought of turning her hedgehog boyfriend into a whale so she could play with him and get teased by him all she liked."In fact we could start right now!" Amy got up and into the kitchen, and walked back out carrying a mountain of freshly cooked chilli-dogs on a plate. She put the plate down on the floor and began stuffing handfuls of chilli-dogs into Sonic's mouth, making his cheeks swell. He swallowed in surprise, and bloomphed up to three times his size- he was now bigger than the sofa, which was now smothered under his softness. Amy climbed up onto his chest, sinking into it deeper than before, and Sonic looked up at her, whimpering. "A-amy," he stuttered, "I demand that you stop this immediately or I'm gonna have to squash you!" Amy tutted and waved another handful of chilli-dogs in front of his face. "Oh come ooon, Sonikku," she moaned. "I want to make you my big blimpy hot hedgehog hero!"

"And I just want to be fast 'n thin again, now knock it off!" Sonic growled a little and tried to move, his fat body jiggling all over and Amy clinged onto him, secretly enjoying the ride. "Could you at least think about it?" She whimpered pleadingly and looked at him with twinkly puppy-eyes. Sonic hated to disappoint Amy of all people so he settled back down, held Amy close and thought. And after a few minutes later he grinned. "Oh Amy..." He chirped. "I think I know what I wanna do now..."

Cream finally became as large as the universe, and managed to break the bonds of reality, and came tumbling down into a plane of nonexistence.
"Where are we?" Cream managed to ask, through her impossibly fat face.
"We're here." Vanilla said simply, embracing the void.

Vanilla managed to make Cream so undeniably fat, that they were deemed impossible for reality, and were sent to an infinite realm, where Cream could continue fattening up for all eternity, without compromising the bonds of reality to complete annihilation of existence.
And they stayed there, Vanilla keeping Cream fat and happy.

Cream was happy, as well, because she learned to accept her massive weight, and now with no more uncomfortable galaxies ramming into her rear, she could learn to be happy, for her mother.

Obsessed with wanting to grow even more.

After some time, Cream was as big as a universe now. As big as was, Vanilla still wanted her sweet daughter to grow even more. Vanilla wanted Cream to outgrow the universe, but maybe all the planes of existence point, Cream just accepted not getting any breaks and just deal with the feedings.

At this point, her hunger was close to endless now. A giant void that could never be filled. Cream and Vanilla could see all the stars and other universes. As long as there was space, Vanilla wanted Cream to fill it.

The machine fed Cream more and more and churned loud enough for the whole galaxy to hear. Her belly grew beyond the bonds of one universe on onto the next one. Then the next one. Then the next one. After a while of universe filling, Cream...

12312112121122211222122.content:
As Cream started to began expanding enough to begin filling up the parts of the Multiverse, something started happening with Cream. After doing nothing but eating the whole time, it started to affect Cream's desires.

"More... Want... More..." Cream muttered with the hose still in her mouth.
"You want more? Okay sweetie. I'll fix the machine to go even faster." Vanilla said happily want to give Cream what she wants.

A few tweaks and the machine was working faster by 10 times. Cream still grew with every passing second. Yet it still wasn't enough.

"More.... More...." Cream moaned.

It seems like after eating so much, Cream now only cared about eating since it was all she could do. Cream's fat continued on to the limits of the Multiverse. Cream then....
12312112121122211222122.title: Obsessed with wanting to grow even more.

1232.content:
Based on this drawing -> http://browse.deviantart.com/?qh=&sectio...





Cream swallowed the last bite of her carrot cake with a huge gulp and patted her enlarged and soft stomach. She hiccuped and giggled, then got up to put the plate in the sink. Cream's body truly had thickened over the past month and a half. The carrot cake she just ate was just the most recent of many cakes she had been wolfing down recently. Needless to say, the cakes were absolutely delicious, but were rather fattening should they be eaten by only one person. The effects that these carrot cakes had taken on Cream's body were obvious, as a month ago, Cream did not have such thick arms and legs, such a wide waist, or, most apparent, such a large belly. While she wasn't huge or anything scale tipping, she was certainly bigger than she was last month.

But Cream's new eating habits aren't her fault; the cakes were offered to her. One of her closest friends, Tails, had been baking these carrot cakes for her, and for her only. Over the last month and a half, Tails would stop by Cream's house and offer a carrot cake to her, and she would take it and eat it. While it is certainly a nice thing to do, what really made Cream pack on all these pounds is that his arrivals with the cakes were very common. Not daily, but rarely would any more than three days pass without Tails giving Cream cake.

Cream couldn't really say she even had a care for her recent weight gain, in fact, she hardly even knew about it. Sure she could feel it in her body and her clothes that she's getting bigger, but more often than not, she doesn't notice. Vanilla, Cream's mother, had noticed her daughter's expansion, and it wasn't until she said something about it that Cream actually knew about it. Vanilla didn't tell Cream about her weight gain to make her stop, she was simply telling her just to let her know. Vanilla wasn't really a mother that would do anything for or to her daughter to make her sad; as far as Vanilla could be concerned, her daughter's happiness was the most important thing in the world. So, Vanilla allowed Cream to continue eating Tails' carrot cakes, and as a result, the once slim and light Cream became chubby and heavy.
1232.title: Fattening gifts, chubby results

choices: Tails gives Cream a cake that was already baked
12322.content:
'I never did get to thank Tails for the cake today...' Cream thought to herself as she walked towards the front door of her house, 'He visits me all the time, I'll go visit him!'

Cream walked outside of her house and jumped, flapping her large rabbit ears. Unfortunately, she fell right back onto the ground. Confused, she tried jumping into flight again, but with the same results - she dropped like a rock. The overweight rabbit eventually gave up and sighed, then started walking instead of flying.

"I can't even fly..." Cream muttered to herself, "I couldn't have gotten that fat could I?" Cream looked down at her body and rubbed her abdomen with one hand, noticing the sort of "dome" like shape her stomach took. She poked her belly through her dress, and winced a little at how far her finger went in. To make it worse, she had eaten an entire cake just a few minutes before hand, so her stomach wasn't empty, and therefore, her finger couldn't go as far.

Cream eventually started getting a little tired. Strange, considering all the running she used to do, getting tired from walking, especially just for a few minutes, shouldn't be tiring for her at all. It was a little obvious to Cream as to why she was getting winded already - her tubby body.

Fortunately for Cream, Tails' house was just in sight. She sucked it up just a little bit more so she could reach his house, but by this point, she started to breathe heavily and sweat a little. Cream managed to make it to the front door and gave it a few knocks. Seconds later, the door was open by the very person Cream was expecting: Tails. Tails gasped and immedietly lunged at Cream to give her a hug. Tails not only loved the fact that Cream had just visited him, but he also loved the fact that her body was so soft and warm.

Tails pulled away a little so he could see Cream's face, "I'm so happy to see you, but why did you come?"

Cream's smile filled her puffy face, "I just wanted to come and say thank you for the cake for today, I never did thank you earlier."

"Oh well you're welcome sweetie- uh I mean, Cream." Tails answered. Although Tails' little stutter was pretty good at masking what he originally said, it was no use with Cream. She clearly heard him say "sweetie".

"Besides," Said Cream as she used the hug to pull Tails towards her, "You always visit me, so I just wanted to visit you for once."

"That's..." Tails' face reddened, "That's nice...come right in." Cream let go of Tails and walked right in. Tails closed the door behind them, "Make yourself feel at home."

"Thanks. So what have you been doing?" Cream asked, looking around.

"I've actually been baking more cakes for you, surprise surprise." Tails answered.

Cream turned to Tails, "Really?"

"Really. I've noticed how quick you were to eat the cake I gave you earlier today, so I figured that maybe you might have room for more cake. I was planning on giving you another cake today actually."

"Cool."

Tails walked into the kitchen and picked up a large bowl, "The cake is already baking, but here's the rest of its batter if you would like."

Cream followed Tails and took the offered bowl, "I love cake batter!" Cream squealed as she looked inside the bowl. Sure enough, the inside was covered, but not filled with, cake batter. Delicious cake batter. Cream slid her hand around the inside of the bowl so she could get as much of the battery as possible and licked it off of her hands. She moaned in joy - she hadn't had cake batter in quite a long time, and it was a taste she absolutely loved. Not as good as the carrot cakes, but pretty far up there.

"Tails," Cream started, after swallowing, "I have a question."

"Yes Cream?" Tails asked.

"Um...have I been getting fat?" Cream asked.

Tails looked at Cream, "Why?"

"Well...I jiggle, I couldn't fly - I had to walk here, and I got tired rather quickly." Cream pointed out.

Tails winced when Cream said she walked to his house, "You walked here?"

"Yes."

"Well I wouldn't be too worried about it." Tails assured as he walked towards Cream, who went back to licking the cake battery. He gave Cream's belly a light pat and slowly rubbed it, "You do look like you have been putting on some weight, but you're just a little chubby. No problem."

Cream made a verbalization of agreement as she continued to lick the bowl clean of its contents.
12322.title: Too tubby for her flight

choices: Asked Tails to rub her belly
123222.content:
"But..." Said Tails, "I happen to be on an...experiment, and I have a favor to ask you."

Cream made eye contact, "What favor?"

"Well, since you have been putting on weight, I was hoping that you would help me with this project I'm doing. It is a...sort of medicine I'm trying to make for overweight people. I'm aiming for something that would make the expansion of fat cells slower, at the very least, so the user doesn't gain weight anywhere near as fast, and would actually be able to catch up and eventually lose weight faster than he or she can gain it." The whole statement had a sort of overtone that made it sound unconvincing, but Cream bought it.

"And you want to test it on me?" Cream asked.

"Well...if you don't mind."

Cream smiled, "I'd gladly help you Tails!"

Tails sighed in relief, then scratched the back of his head, "Thanks, I really appreciate it...though if you don't mind, you're probably going to have to gain some more weight. I don't think I'll be able to achieve the results I want unless you're fatter."

Cream shrugged, "I'll do it. I just hope it'll work; I don't want to become a blob."

"If it doesn't work, I'll try everything to make you lose the weight."

"Thanks."

"Well since you've agreed to help me out on this, and since I need you to be a..."few"...pounds heavier, I have a cake that I've already baked for myself that you can have."

"Really?" Cream asked, excited to eat the delicious carrot cake.

"Yeah, I'll go get it." Tails said as he left the room. Cream looked at a couch that was beside a wall and walked to it and sat in it. The seat cushion immedietly lowered in height when the overweight rabbit rested upon it. Cream leaned back and took a decent look at her body, particularly her midsection. Even when leaning back, Cream's belly still stuck out a good two inches, and had a slight hang. Not enough to hang over the waistline, but there was a hang nonetheless. Cream softly rubbed her belly with a single hand and gave it a few pats as Tails walked back into the room with the carrot cake.

Tails placed the cake on the table which was a few feet away from Cream, "Well, dig in. Be careful to not make a mess." He punctuated his sentence with a friendly chuckle. Cream took no hesitation and certainly did dig in to the carrot cake, shoving the delicious breaded glory into her mouth, and ravenously sending it down her throat and into the pit that was known as her stomach.

While this was a rather terrible display of eating habits compared to what Cream would normally do, the carrot cakes were the only things that Vanilla would allow Cream to, for lack of a better word, "attack". Since Cream enjoys them so much, it seemed logical to let her enjoy them as much as she could, while still keeping her regular eating habits in check. Cream would generally eat these cakes on her own terms, as they would almost never serve as a part of the three-square-meal pattern, unless they were saved for desert.

Tails watched as Cream ate and ate and ate the cake. This sight caused the fox to smile, because it represented multiple conclusions: 1, considering Cream had already eaten a cake barely even an hour ago, that means that she might be able to stomach two cakes at once, 2, it certainly proved that Cream either loved the carrot cakes, or had become enthusiastic about gaining weight due to Tails' story, and 3, it just went to show just how quickly Cream will enlarge.

The cake wasn't necessarily big, so it didn't take Cream long to finish it. She rubbed her stomach with both hands then looked at Tails with her cake covered face, "I just thought about it..."

"What?" Tails asked, grabbing a tissue box. He walked to Cream and handed her a tissue, which she used to wipe the cake off of her face.

"Having you been baking these cakes to make me gain weight for your experiment?" Cream asked.

Tails was tongue tied for a brief moment, but he came up with his answer, "Not really. I've been working on this project for a while, and I kinda just wanted to give you a gift really. I know how much you love carrots, so I thought a carrot cake would be a good idea, and since you loved the cake so much, I just decided to bake more and more for you. It was just coincidence."

Cream continued to slowly rub her belly. Tails eyed her belly for a brief moment and asked, "May I join you?" When Cream made a confused face at him, Tails moved his hands in a gesture that implied rubbing.

Cream...
123222.title: A sly plan, going down the hatch

choices: Fast forward to Tails' next visit the next day
1232221.content:
Cream smiled, "Do you want to rub my belly?"

Tails nodded and motioned towards Cream, placing his hand on the squishy mound. He then moved his hand across the belly, feeling its warm softness through Cream's dress. He gave her belly a quick slap, which, while it didn't hurt, sent a jiggle across the entire belly. Tails felt a little awkward, but rather happy, as there was one thought he couldn't get out of his head.

'She's gonna be so delicious.' Tails' subconscience thought. Tails' conscience kicked it and thought, 'NO! That's Cream! My friend!'

Tails tried his best to ignore both of these thoughts as he rubbed Cream's belly, but his subconscience got the better of him, "Would you like more food Cream?"

"I'm not hungry right now." Cream answered, "Besides, I like having my belly rubbed. So soothing." Tails grinned and pinched Cream's belly.

"Hey!" Cream protested. This only unintentionally prompted Tails to grab her belly and shake it violently. After giggling and jiggling for a bit, Cream got up and shoved her belly into Tails' body, knocking him down to the floor.

Cream gasped, "Are you ok?!"

Tails laughed and quickly got back on his feet, "Do that again!"

Cream grinned and did as she was asked. Much like before, she shoved her belly right into Tails' torso and, much like before, knocked him down. This time however, Tails didn't get up; he was too busy laughing. Cream offered her hand to help Tails back on his feet. Tails grabbed Cream's hand as she pulled him back to his feet.

"That was so funny, I didn't expect that the first time at all!" Tails exclaimed.

Cream giggled, "Surprised you, didn't I."

"Oh I got a surprise for you, come with me." Said Tails as he walked to his kitchen towards the fridge. Cream immedietly followed him. Tails opened the door to his fridge and gestured towards the inside of it, "Take a look at this."

Cream peered into the fridge. Tails backed away to give her more room. Tails walked behind her without being noticed and shoved his hands onto her sides, just above the waist, tickling her. Cream then jolted and started bursting with uncontrolled laughter and shaking as Tails continued to tickle her.

Tails then released Cream of her ticklish vassalation and her laughter died down. Cream looked at Tails.

"You little...How did you know I was ticklish?" Cream asked.

Tails shrugged, "I didn't, but I surprised you didn't I?"

Cream nodded, "How long will it be until your experiment is ready for me?"

"It's ready actually." Said Tails, "It's just that you need to be a bit fatter. You can clearly see, I have plenty of food in this house that I don't even eat, and a lot of it are cakes meant for you. I was actually considering making some brownies for you to have within the next few days."

"Really?!" Cream asked.

"Yeah, but seriously though, if you think you'll need help to gain the weight I need you to gain, just give me a visit. I'll bake stuff for you that'll fatten you up. What about your mom though? Does she make fattening food?"

Cream shook her head, "If she did, I think I would have been this big a long time ago. I'll talk to her about it and see what she can do."

"Sweet." Said Tails, "Thanks again by the way."

"No problem." Said Cream, "I gotta go, but do have anything I can eat on the way back home?"

Tails reached to the top of his fridge and pulled down a bag of potato chips, "Not much, but it'll hold you until you get him right?"

"Maybe." Cream half-agreed, taking the bag, "But since I'll have to walk, these things might make me put on...maybe half a pound."

"At best." Tails agreed.

"I'll see you tomorrow?" Cream asked, heading towards the door.

"I'll pay you a visit. I'll try to bring more cake while I'm at it." Said Tails.
1232221.title: Delicious...wait what?!

choices: Cream eats one cake and saves the other for later
12322212.content:
In the early of morning, the sun was just barely up, the grass was still wet, and Tails stood just outside Cream's house, with three carrot cakes on the ground beside him.

Tails looked at the front door and sighed, 'Keep it together man,' he thought, 'you know what you're baking these cakes for her for, and you've already decided to do it.' Suddenly, his conscience kicked in, 'NO! She's my-', but his subconscience came back, 'You have already decided, follow through with it...no pressure...she's already somewhat big already, maybe another 20 pounds and she'll be fat enough.'

Tails sighed again and knocked the door three times. After a few moments, the door was opened, and on the other side was Cream, rubbing her eyes. She was wearing a set of blue pajamas, though the shirt looked rather tight and was somewhat revealing of the lower part of her belly. To make it worse, the bottom button strained so badly to keep itself attached that it looked like a deadly weapon ready to fire at any moment.

"Good morning Cream." Tails greeted. He picked up one of the cakes, "I brought you three cakes this time."

Cream yawned, "I haven't even had breakfast yet; I just woke up."

Tails chuckled and handed Cream the cake he held, "Looks like I brought you breakfast then didn't I."

Cream giggled and took the cake, "Cake for breakfast, that's new. Thanks."

"Here." Said Tails as he squatted down to pick up the remaining two, "I have more. Where would you like me to put these?"

Cream smiled and said, "In my belly." This remark caused Tails to laugh out loud, nearly dropping the cakes.

"But seriously though," Said Tails, whose laugh was still dying down, "Where would you want me to put these?"

"I already told you; in my belly." Said Cream, "But for now, let's put them on our dining room table k?"

"Ok." Said Tails as he followed Cream into her house, and towards a table that was just outside of the kitchen. They laid the three cakes on the table.

"Ok so...I'll see you later." Said Tails, turning towards the door.

"Thanks again Tails." Said Cream, "I'll make sure I finish all of these today."

Tails chuckled as he walked toward the front door, "Your welcome, and make sure you pack on some more pounds while you're at it."

Cream giggled, "I'm sure I will get a bit fatter. Bye!"

"Bye!" Tails called out as he closed the door from the outside.

Cream looked back at the three carrot cakes that sat on the table beside her. She sat in one of the chairs and brought one of the cakes towards her. She then picked up a fork on the table and took a bite out of the carrot cake, then she looked up and made a quiet moan of delight, as the cake was phenominally delicious. From that moment on, the next few minutes consisted of Cream shoving her fork into the cake, eating the piece of cake, then repeating. This constant pattern was repetative, but with each passing repeat the cake was getting smaller and smaller, being transferred piece by piece into the belly of the rabbit that was eating it. Cream certainly wasn't kidding when she said she wanted the cake "in her belly". Within moments, the cake was out of sight, but Cream's abdomen wasn't. When she had finished the cake, she stretched, which had unfortunately brought the bottom button of her pajama shirt to its end. The button popped, but it didn't fly off like what most people would have expected. Now the button merely hung, dangling loosely, barely attached to the piece of sleeping attire. The lack of the bottom button doing its work caused the pajama shirt to rise up and spread out some. Now, every inch of Cream's soft belly from the belly button down was perfectly visible, but Cream paid no attention. She merely rubbed her belly and licked her lips at the remaining two cakes.
12322212.title: Cake for breakfast

choices: Skip to when they're back, and Cream has big clothes and a craving for the cake
123222122.content:
You would think that Cream hadn't eaten in days. That she had been starved, malnutritioned, deprived of any amount of supplements. As Cream "attacked" one of the two remaining cakes, wolfing them down with impressive speed, these assumptions became more and more believable, yet more and more unbelievable, because she had eaten another cake just like this one mere moments ago. She showed no focus or attention to anything else; at that moment, all that mattered was making that cake disappear off the face of the earth, and the only way it could be done is by stuffing it into her rather large belly. If she had the chance to, she would admit that she was running low on space. Eating two cakes in such a short time, even with her large appetite, would be a tricky achievement. This didn't faze her. She didn't slow down; she kept eating, the cake kept shrinking, and her belly kept expanding ever so slightly.

Cream leaned back and burped. Looking down at the plate, she smiled at the lack of any cake on top of it. She gave her belly a quick little pat and giggled. All she needed was a top-hat and black suit and this whole binge would have looked like a magic trick. As she looked at the third and final cake, her belly growled, not of hunger, but of digesting, and she knew it. She would have loved to have eat this last cake, but she knew her limits. She simply sighed, lazily got up from the chair, which creaked with the tiniest of movements, took the cake and placed it in the fridge. It'll have to wait for later.

Just then, Vanilla walked into the kitchen yawning. She noticed that Cream was putting something in the fridge, but what really caught her attention was the quality of Cream's pajamas.

"Good morning Cream," The adult rabbit said with a smile, "I'm guessing you already had breakfast."

Cream closed the fridge and stood straight up with a big smile and nodded, "Tails came by and brought me some cakes! They were delicious!"

"Really! Carrot cakes?" Vanilla asked. She knew that they were carrot cakes; it certainly wasn't the first time Tails brought some over. She just wanted to ask.

Cream nodded again and gestured to the fridge, "I put one of them in the fridge for later; I'm stuffed after eating the other two."

"You ate two whole cakes?" Vanilla asked, surprised.

"I did!" Cream exclaimed. She patted her belly, causing it to bounce, "They were yummy yummy in my tummy!"

Vanilla hesitated before crouching down to give her daughter's belly a poke, "Well I'm glad to hear that you liked them, and that you saved some for me too."

Cream giggled, "I was actually going to eat it later, but I'll share."

"Well thank you very much." Vanilla said with a big grin, "And it looks like you're going to need some new clothes and pajamas too. Go get the scale in the bathroom and weigh yourself for me, and I'll get the tape measure so I can see what size you need. Ok?"

Cream nodded and said, "Ok." It was almost as if she was excited about it. She turned and waddled out of the kitchen, and Vanilla reached into a drawer and pulled out a roll of measuring tape.





Cream stepped on the scale, which was a big square shaped digital scale. It made a beeping sound, and a dash mark ran from one side of the screen to the other for a few seconds. It beeped one more time and 42 lbs 7 oz popped up on the screen. Cream had to bend over a little to see her weight, as her belly was obstructing her vision slightly. 42 pounds may not seem like much, but considering the fact that Cream was only about 3 feet tall, this was a pretty big number for weight. Vanilla momentarily walked in with a roll of measuring tape in her hand. She looked down at the scale and nodded, "42 pounds. That's pretty big."

"Yup." Cream agreed with her face covered in a smile. Vanilla knelt down and Cream held her arms up. Vanilla placed one end of the tape right above Cream's belly button and held it in place with her thumb, then wrapped the tape around Cream's body once, and stopped the tape right above Cream's belly button. Vanilla looked closely at the numbers and looked back at Cream.

"26 inches." Said Vanilla.

"Pretty big?" Cream asked, knowing the answer.

Vanilla wrapped the tape up and agreed, "That's pretty big. Of course this doesn't impair how cute you are."

Cream grinned, "I am a growing girl." She rubbed her belly, "I should be called Chubby Cream!"

Vanilla giggled, "Well I think you're going to be bigger than chubby before you know it. Anyway, the clothes you have now are large, so we're going to be looking for extra large clothing, maybe even double extra large. Get dressed and we'll leave when I have breakfast."

"Ok mommy." Said Cream
123222122.title: One more for now

choices: Later that day, when Tails visits Cream again
1232221222.content:
Cream and Vanilla walked up to the front door of their house. Vanilla was wearing her usual blouse and dress, and Cream was wearing a dress very similar to the orange dress she usually wears, but of course much bigger to accommodate for her size. Vanilla fiddled with her keys in one hand; her other hand was holding bags of clothes. She stuck a key into the door nob and opened the door, with Cream being the first of the both of them to walk into the house. After closing the door, Cream walked into the kitchen, but Vanilla walked to Cream's room so she could put the new clothes in her closet. While Vanilla did this, Cream pulled the third cake out of the fridge and licked her lips loudly. She placed it on the table and prepared to dig in before being stopped by her mother.

"Come on Cream, I asked you to save some for me." Vanilla said in a slightly teasing voice. Cream sighed and got two plates and two forks form a nearby drawer and gave one plate and fork to her mother, who sat down at the table on the opposite side from Cream, with the cake in between them. From that point on, they both started eating the cake from top to bottom. Cream was eating much faster than Vanilla was, and with much bigger bites. Vanilla couldn't really complain about it, but it did sort of bug her a little.

"Cream, could you please try eating a little slower?" Vanilla suggested.

Cream released a tiny burp and an "excuse me" before answering with, "Sorry mother; I'm just hungry."

Again, Vanilla couldn't say anything against that. They had been gone for a few hours, mainly because the mall was quite a distance away and because it took them a while to find dresses that were big enough for Cream's girth. Vanilla had to admit that she was starting to feel a little hungry by the time they started heading back.

"It's ok, just don't inhale the cake." Vanilla softly commanded. She took another bite and said, "Delicious. Tails baked this right?"

Cream would have said something, but her mouth was full, so she simply nodded.

"I'd love to get the recipe from him; these cakes are fantastic!" Vanilla exclaimed.

Cream patted her belly and agreed, "I know!" She said, before breaking into a giggle that Vanilla couldn't help but join.

After a few more moments, the cake was almost completely gone, but Vanilla got up from her seat and said, "Ok, I'm done. It was very good."

"It's the best cake you've ever had right?" Cream asked, pulling what remained of the cake towards her.

"It is the best cake I've ever had. Tails is a great cook." Vanilla said before taking her plate and fork to the sink to wash them. Cream looked down at the rest cake and shoved it into her mouth, practically swallowing it with one gulp. Almost on cue, the doorbell rang.

Vanilla looked back towards Cream and asked, "Cream could you get that please?"

Without second thought, Cream got out of her chair and walked towards the door. She looked through the peephole in the door and gasped with excitement. She opened the door immedietly and smiled wide. Tails was on the other side, holding a tray of brownies.

"Hey Cream!" Said Tails, "Here are the brownies I mentioned." He hardly needed to hand them to Cream; she practically took the tray out of his hands, unable to contain herself.

"Thanks!" Said Cream, "I don't know what to say!"

"Maybe, but I know what you can do with those brownies." Tails stated. Cream grinned; she knew exactly what he meant.

"Anyway, I can't stay for long." Tails continued, "I have to meet up with Sonic down at Green Hill, but I'll be back later. Ok?"

Cream nodded, "Ok! I'll just eat these while you're gone!"

Tails shrugged, "That's what I gave them to you for. Bye!"

"Bye!" Cream called before closing the door, holding the tray in one hand. She headed back to the kitchen, saying "Mommy Mommy! Look what Tails brought me!"

Vanilla turned to Cream, "Aww..." She verbalized when she saw the brownies, "That was awfully nice of him. I can only imagine how good those must taste."

"Let's find out." Said Cream as she took a brownie and ate it. Almost instantly after swallowing it, she might as well have started bouncing off the walls. "THESE ARE DELICIOUS!!!" She screamed.

"Really?! Oh, let me have just one bite." Vanilla begged. Cream answered her wish by holding a brownie up to her so she could bend over and take a bite out of it. Her reaction wasn't much different, but was much more calm at least.

"Wow, these are delicious!" Vanilla exclaimed.

"More?" Cream asked.

"No thanks." Vanilla said as she started washing the soap off of her hands, "That cake filled me up quite well. You can have those brownies if you want."

"Ok, thanks!" Cream exclaimed. She took a nearby chair and sat on it, then began to feed upon the chocolate, carrot juice covered brownies.
1232221222.title: Taking down the last cake

choices: Cream passes out in the chair
Tails returns, with even Baked Goods
12322212221.content:
Vanilla started to leave "I'm going to do some laundry and then relax with a little TV, is there anything else you need?"

Cream swallowed her second brownie now "Mm~ Yes there is, mommy. can I have some milk, please?"

"Sure thing, sweetie" Vanilla opened the fridge and brought out the half gallon of 2% milk, placing it on the table with a cup for Cream.

"Thanks, mommy" Cream said happily as she started on her third and forth brownies. She was pushing her cake filled belly's limits even further with each bite of these chocolate squares. At about her tenth one she popped the cap off the milk jug, drinking straight from it to clear her pallet for the next dozen or so, her thick neck bulging and constricting with each gulp. She knew her belly was getting full, but these were too good. Tails had brought them over fresh from the oven, meaning they were still warm and gooey. She continued to fill her mouth in her stuffed stupor as she absentmindedly stretched her belly to hold more capacities of food. Her dress started to ride up as there was a steady increase of her to cover. Bite after bite, gulp after gulp, she continued until the 40 brownies and half gallon of milk were gone, and even then she was licking at the plate to get at all the crumbs. Her cheeks puffed up as some gas tried to escape, but she didn't want to interrupt her mother's show with a distraction like that. Cream looked at the clock to see that an hour had passed. "oh wow, I hardly noticed" she giggled as she rubbed her over-filled tummy. "If I keep like this I'll be 50-55lbs by morning." She yawned, her body wanting to rest after such a stuffing.

Cream started to nod off in her chair when a ringing doorbell startled her awake.

"Don't worry honey, I'll get it" Said her loving mother. As Vanilla answered the door, she was met with young fox boy genius.

"Afternoon, Vanilla," he said with a smile. He was holding Two Dozen Doughnuts, and what looked like a wagon full of groceries for making even more sweets and treats. "I'm back from Green Hill Zone and thought I'd stop and stay for a proper visit."

"Oh, but of course. Do you need help with any of that?"

"Nah, I'm good, thanks though."

She steps aside to let the fox in, "While you're here, could I get that cake recipe from you? It was Really good!"

"Sure thing, I'll write it up and put it on the fridge"

"Oh that would be wonderful, you're such a darling" She smiled as she watched him march into the kitchen, and then returned to her shows, leaving the little ones be.

Cream turned her head to see Tails, too stuffed to move. "How's my Hungry Bunny doing?" he asked as he placed the donuts on the table.

She lets out another small burp, "N-not so hungry anymore. 3 cakes and 40 brownies? I'm so full, just look at my tummy." Her new dress, which fit not even a couple hours ago, was now riding up her belly, the under part of it exposed.

"Aww, that's too bad," he opens the boxes, the scent of the pastries filling the room, "These just came fresh from the bakery," her mouth already starting to water, "and I had them over fill each of these with a Creamy Carrot Filling just for you~"

The stuffed rabbit lurched forward and grabbed two of the over-cremed doughnuts with each hand and started filling her cheeks once again. Their fillings were very rich and oh so smooth, she could hardly believe such a sweetness existed. As she swallowed, she winced at the slight pressure her belly was under as it distended a little more. She couldn't handle much more eating, but she didn't want to stop either.

"Are you alright, Cream?" the fox boy asked.

"Y-yeah, just...ooooogh...so...so full. I'm about ready to burst"

"Here, let me help you with that," he smiled as he looked through the bags he brought over. Tails pulled out a bottle of lotion. A side project for fattening up the rabbit girl, made to ease her belly aches and help it stretch a little further. Squirting some lotion onto her belly, he started to gently rub it into her skin and fur. She wasn't thrilled about it at first, as she was so very full, but after a few minutes, the pain had subsided, and Cream started snacking again.

One doughnut after another vanished from it's box and into her mouth. The food filled balloon that was her belly steadily growing as she devoured the pastries. Her dress rode up even higher, not even covering half of her belly by the time she finished all 24 of the tasty treats. Once again, she was super full, not wanting to eat another bite. She was about to let out a large, satisfied belch when Tails locked lips with her, letting the sweet gas fill his cheeks. "T-tails!?" she blushes.

He licks his lips as he chuckles, "Wow, your kisses are almost as sweet as you are." Cream blushes even more. "ready for another course?

"Th-thank you, Tails, but...I'm really Really full now," she tries to get out of her chair, but her cheeks seem quite wedged into it. "All this eating has made me quite sleepy.

1232221222122.title: Gluttonous Stuffing

choices: Tails cooks some fattening food for Cream
A little discussion about Tails gaining weight along side Cream
12322212222.content:
Tails stood just outside the door to Cream's house. He sighed and knocked on the door three times and brought his hand from the large, elaborately designed slab of wood. Within seconds, he faintly heard footsteps drawing nearer and louder to the other side of the door. He was hoping it was Cream, but instead, Vanilla answered the door. Vanilla smiled, happy to have a visitor, and Tails smiled, asking, "Hello ma'am. Is Cream here?"

Vanilla's smile grew a little wider as she turned and called, "Cream, Tails is here!" Very shortly, Cream came rushing towards the door, and practically tackled Tails in the form of a big hug. She let Tails go after a few seconds of the hug and they smiled at eachother.

"I'm sorry I didn't bring anything for you Cream." Tails apologized, scratching the back of his head.

"Oh it's ok." Said Cream, "Those brownies were great by the way."

"Glad you liked them." Said Tails. He turned to Vanilla and asked, "Vanilla, can Cream come over to my place for a while? Please?"

Vanilla released a soft chuckle and answered, "If Cream wants to..."

Cream practically cut her mother off with jumping and shouting "Thank you thank you thank you!" She gave her mother a big hug.

"You can stay until tomorrow, but I want you back by lunchtime, ok?" Vanilla ordered. Cream pulled her face up so she could nod, "Go pack yourself a change of clothes, and then you may go."

Cream squealed in joy and would've started skipping back into the house if her girth allowed it. With Cream gone, Vanilla took this opprotunity to personally thank Tails for all the good's he's been baking.

"Thanks for all the food you've been making for Cream." Vanilla thanked, "They've been giving me a break from cooking." That very statement made the two of them laugh a little.

"You're welcome." Said Tails, "I started baking cakes for her when I was in the middle of cooking some food for myself, and I started thinking of her. After I ate, I baked a carrot cake for her, and I guess it just turned into a habit from then on."

"Well that's very sweet of you." Said Vanilla.

"Although, I can't help but think that Cream's been putting on weight from the cakes I've been making for her..." Tails falsely wondered. He knew that Cream's weight gain was caused by his bakeries, but he didn't want Vanilla to know.

"Don't worry Tails." Vanilla assured, "She's been sitting around quite a bit recently as well, that's probably what's doing it."

"Ok." Tails agreed, continuing his act. Moments later, Cream approached them, carrying a small duffel bag.

"Ok Cream, I'll see you tomorrow." Said Vanilla as she bent down to kiss Cream on the cheek, "Have fun you two."

"We will mommy!" Cream assured as she followed Tails, who lead the way to his house, "Bye!"





Tails and Cream walked close to each other, making their way towards Tails' house. They haven't spoken a word to each other, but after a long time of silence, Cream decided to say something.

"I really appreciate this Tails, thanks." Said Cream. Tails turned to her and smiled.

"You're welcome. To be honest, I came over today to see how big you were. The reason I wanted you to come over was because I thought you were ready for my experiments."

"Really?" Cream asked, somewhat excited.

"I think so, but I'm not quite sure." Said Tails, "I'll have to weigh and measure you before I start."

"Oh my mom already did that." Said Cream, "I weigh 42 pounds and my belly is 26 inches around!"

"Yeah you're gonna have to get a little bigger, sorry." Said Tails, "But what am I worrying about? I've got plenty of food at my house you can eat. My experiment can wait a little while longer."

"Ok!" Cream agreed. She was a little disappointed that she wasn't big enough for Tails' experiment with weight loss, but like he said, it probably won't be much longer. Besides, she remembered what Tails said last time. Supposedly, he had lots of food that were quite fattening, and that he would let her eat it if she wanted/needed to.

But a rather interesting thought entered her mind, "Tails, you said you have a lot of fattening food right?"

"Yeah?"

"Why don't you ever eat it yourself?" Cream asked.

Tails chuckled, "I'm saving it for you silly."

Cream giggled, "I know, but why can't you eat some? So we can bet chubby together!"

Tails took a second to think about it and said, "Maybe. Just maybe."





After minutes of walking, they finally approached Tails' house. Tails worked with some keys to unlock it, barely hearing Cream's growling belly as he did so. He paused and turned back to her with a sarcastic face that had "was that you?" written all over it.

Cream giggled, "Sorry Tails, I can't help it."

"Riiiiiiight." Tails sarcastically agreed. He went back to fiddling with the lock and opened the door.
12322212222.title: Cream stays over at Tails' for a while

choices: Tomorrow, around lunch time - Tails takes Cream back home
123222122221.content:
"Annnnnnd, your meal is ready!" Tails announced. He stepped out of his dining room into his living room, where Cream lazily sat on a couch watching TV. From her position, she could not see the kitchen. Precisely what Tails wanted; he wanted to make it all a surprise. With excitement and hunger, Cream cried "Yay!" and practically jumped from the couch, following Tails into the dining room. The instant she stepped inside, she squealed in joy.

While the table wasn't big, being circular and only four feet across, the majority of it was covered in baked goods, desserts, and snacks, which primarily consisted of junk food. The foods were carefully divided and categorized: the baked goods on one end, desserts on another, and the junk food on another, and each category also seemed to be strategically ordered in size. The baked goods were brownies, cakes, muffins, and cupcakes. The desserts were bowls ice cream for the most part, but jello and yogurt were in the mix as well. The "snacks", as mentioned before, were junk food - chocolate bars, hard candy, typical small snacks that would give any kid a complete sugar rush.

Cream wasted no time and rushed to devour her first target - the desserts. While she knew that desserts should be eaten last, her instincts new that eating all that ice cream before it would melt would be a smarter proposition, so she went were her gut told her. She didn't bother with a spoon; shoveling handfuls of the dairy goods was much quicker, but also much messier unfortunately. On the plus side, it wasn't as messy as anyone would've thought. One could only see very little of the ice cream fall from her hands down to her clothes. Cream of course paid little attention to any of this, and aimed all of her focus on eating and eating and eating.

She had to stop, however, as one could only rapidly eat ice cream for so long before the inevitable happens - a brain freeze. She abruptly paused her feast to grab her head in cold pain. Within seconds, she stuck her thumb into her mouth, rubbing against the roof of her mouth. Because of this, her brain freeze dwindled to nothing in mere moments, and she went back to stuffing herself. She couldn't eat much more ice cream though - there was hardly any left by this point. When she realized she ate all of the ice cream, she pulled the plate of jello to her face and started slurping it up as if she was drinking it. The jello showed no resistance as it was sucked into her mouth and then swallowed into her stomach. As Tails watched this magnificent event, he couldn't help but think that he should've made more jello.

Cream then attacked the yogurt. Much like the jello, she basically drank it, and also much like the jello, there wasn't much of it, so it was all gone before Tails even knew it. With the dessert section completely eaten, Cream motioned towards the side with all of the candy. Her instincts told her that she needed the sugar to keep herself going, and she complied. Tails took the liberty of unwrapping all of the candy, so all Cream had to do was eat it. The hard candy wasn't very tough - they shattered rather easily - so they went down quite easy. The chocolate bars practically disappeared into thin air whenever she brought one to her face. She was so quick to eat them that even Tails thought they just vanished right before his eyes. At least he had a very good idea of where it went.

While there was a lot of candy, Cream didn't take long to eat all of it. When she finally finished, she burped, then giggled. She then turned towards the baked goods, leaning towards them like a predatorial animal. As she got up and walked to the side with the rest of the food, it became clear to Tails that Cream's stuffing was catching up - her skirt definitely looked tighter than it did a few minutes ago. Before, it merely looked like a big orange clock that hung over her torso down to her thighs. By this point, anyone could see that her belly and waist were pressing against it, but barely.

Tails chuckled to himself as he watched Cream feed upon the muffins, gulping them down in two or three bites each. He smiled at Cream's progress. She had just started with these muffins about half a minute ago, and she was already done. She then "attacked" the cup cakes. Now these things were tiny. Cream was able to fit three of them in her hand, so it goes without saying that these things weren't even chewed before they entered her gullet. Even their large numbers didn't stop the hungry Cream from giving them a new home. With the cup cakes gone, she went after the brownies next.

Cream could feel it - she was stuffed full. She knew that she probably wasn't going to be able to eat all of these brownies and have enough room for that cake. She began to doubt herself, as each brownie she swallowed left less and less space in her belly. She tried to ignore it, but each passing morsel made itself comfortable in what little room she had left. As she reached for the last brownie, she tried her best to not think. If she thought about how full she was, she would probably stop. She couldn't let that happen. She had food to eat, a loving fox to impress, only one brownie left, and pounds to put on.

Tails started clapping his hands together. Cream leaned back onto the chair, softly moaning in pain. She looked down at the plate of brownies and saw that it was completely clean, aside from crumbs. She had eaten the last brownie. She had eaten everything on that table, except for the cake. It'll have to wait.

Cream turned to Tails and said, "Tails...I'm gonna pop. Help me up please."

Tails quickly helped Cream onto her feet and walked her out of the dining room, "That was very good." He complimented, "I didn't know you could eat that much."

"Thanks." Cream softly said, "I'm a little surprised too..." They reached the couch, and Tails helped Cream lay against the back of the couch - he knew that laying on your back was a bad idea when you just ate, but he couldn't imagine how badly it would be in this case.

"I'm going to be so fat..." Cream whispered, dozing off.

Tails smiled and softly rubbed her belly, which aided her in her sleepiness. When it became clear to him that she was finally out like a light, he stopped rubbing, and left the room so he could get some sheets for her. It wasn't close to night, but he knew that she was going to be asleep for a while, so long as he kept things quiet.

Wave let out an enormous belch. She started licking frosting and meat sauce off of her beak. The sexy swallow just eat up her fifth meal of the morning and was waiting for her next one. She had groggy and sleepy look on face. Thinking about nothing except food and gaining more weight. She couldn't move a single inch, her body can only jiggle her fat. Wave wasn't satisfied at this weight. She wanted to eat more and more. Her fat self expanding more and more. An endless sea of blubber.

She began to smell her coming from down the hall. Calzone, baked ziti with meatball, lasagna and plate of cookies.

"Mmm... more food coming this way... burrrrp... so hungry... thank goodness I created those serving robots before i got too fat to move... burp!"

The little robot wore a chef hat and was playing a little tune on its built in radio. It rolled the food cart with all the smells going into her beak. Wave started to drool as she opened her beak waiting for it to be stuffed. The robot scooped up a big wad of lasagna and placed three cookies on top of the Italian cuisine. It shoved it into Wave mouth and she began to moan. She slowly chewed and ate the food up. The process repeated it self till all the food on the tray was gone. The grabbed a funnel and long rubber tube out of the closet and took out a gallon of chocolate milk out of the mini fridge. It placed the tube into Wave yellow beak and squeezed the funnel into the tube. The robotic servant started pouring the chocolaty beverage down the funnel and Wave drank it all down in matter of minutes.

The little robot removed the funnel and Wave let another burp.

"BUUUUUURAAAPP!!! Oh by the gods, that was delicious... It's time for my body massage serve bot..."
